root.name: Let's Dance with Mel B
root.description: Track ListPussy Cat Dolls - Don't ChaRihanna - DisturbiaFergie - Quando Quando QuandoSpice Girls - WannabeCameo - Word UpSpandau Ballet - GoldNoelia - CandelaHolly Valance - Kiss KissFatboy Slim - The Rockafeller Skank50 Cent - In Da Club (clean version)Mousse T - All Night LongDavid Guetta feat. Kelly Rowland - CommanderPixie Lott - Mama DoJust Jack - Starz In Their EyesChumbawumba - TubthumpingMika Love - TodayCulture Club - Karma ChameleonOMD- Enola GayPaulina Rubio - Y Sigo AquiRahman Feat Pussycat Dolls - Jai Ho!Maroon 5 - This LovePixie Lott - Boys and GirlsCe Ce Peniston - FinallyYolanda Be Cool DCup - We No Speak AmericanoSarah Vaughan - Peter Gunn (remix)Rose Royce - Car WashGloria Gaynor - I Will SurviveLady Gaga - Poker FaceRegionsDeveloped and originally released in the UK in May 2011 with box art touting "completely in ENGLISH." The North American release didn't come out for almost another year, assumingly to replace that pesky English with some good ol' fashioned American voices. It also removes the "with Mel B" part of the game title (probably because most American's don't know who Mel B is), and simply goes with the staggeringly generic title "Let's Dance."
